amendment.description: To require life cycle cost estimates for the destruction of lethal chemical munitions under the Assembled Chemical Weapons Alternatives program.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1418 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 1418 proposed by Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S8728; text: CR S8728) To require life cycle cost estimates for the destruction of lethal chemical munitions under the Assembled Chemical Weapons Alternatives program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1418 proposed by Senator Allard.
